lead_paragraph: ROME, March 1 -- Bulgaria's adherence to the tripartite pact today is regarded here as an event that should among other things, warn Washington against interfering in a Europe asserted to be solidly aligned with the Axis.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

snippet: ROME, March 1 -- Bulgaria's adherence to the tripartite pact today is regarded here as an event that should among other things, warn Washington against interfering in a Europe asserted to be solidly aligned with the Axis....

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
